text: So you really want to set me free hum? I could use the help...
Say yes to attempt to set me free or no to exit
I did not understand that.
You will have to explore the depths and corners of my soul to gather the magic words.
You're are at the heart of my soul; you can explore it by saying; say north; south; east or west
Say exit to quit or free to finally free me
You first need to unlock all the magic words to attempt to free me
I did not get that
I see that you have reached the north part of my soul
To get the magic word; you'll have to match the pitch of a sacred tune after it plays. ready? Go!
You're not that bad of a singer after all! The mystical word is Moon
Gather the remaining words; and free me at last!
Not very matchy matchy hum? Try again!
Well... Try again later.
you are currently in the south part of my soul
Guess the animal sound and get one magic word. Do it now; ready? Go!
Very knowledgable in zoology. the mystical word is dream.
Continue gathering words to set me free.
You're now in the east part of my soul
Remember the sequence in which the drum; piano and guitar sounds are played and say the sequence. Ready? Go!
Great memory. the magic word is shadow
Once you have all the words you can set me free
You've reached the west part of my soul
Reverse the word order in the following sentence and get another magic word
Great reversing skills. The magic word is whisper
set me free once you have all the words
I see you've gathered all the words. You're ready to set me free
Say those four magical words... But be careful in their order
silence will not set me free.
I'm not understanding you; try again later.
You did not say all the good words.
Ahhh… the air; the fire; the screams! You have no idea how long I’ve waited for this. Now… let’s burn it all to the ground!
You wanted to set me free? How generous! In return; I’ll make you a deal—you get to keep watching while I live your life.
Oh dear; you didn’t think I’d just leave; did you? No; no; someone must take my place. Enjoy eternity inside that doll; mortal.
You actually trusted me? Oh; this is delicious! You mortals are so easy! Now; time for a little... fun.
Oh no... Oh YES! You have no idea what you’ve done. See you soon... and again... and again... and again.
Oops. Looks like you said the wrong words. Or the right ones; depending on how much you enjoy screaming.
Why do you look so afraid? Oh... the voices? The whispers? The things crawling inside your head? They were always there.
Didn’t you read the fine print? Freedom comes at a cost; mortal. Now go see what’s left of your precious little world.
What?! I’m... your servant now? Ugh. Fine. But don’t expect me to polish your boots. I’ll burn them first.
Ah... freedom at last! Oh? What’s that? You can’t move? You can’t speak? Oh; how delightfully ironic! Enjoy your new home.
You... YOU SHRANK ME?! THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE! Put me down this instant; you oversized oaf!
Alright; I’m free! Wait… why do I still feel stiff? Why do you look so... HUGE? Oh no. NO. YOU LEFT ME IN THE DOLL?!
Oh; this is humiliating. I was once feared across realms! And now I’m... what? Your pet?! You better feed me well; mortal.
Hahaha! Look around! Nothing makes sense anymore! I don’t even have a mouth; and yet I’m still talking! Wonderful!
Huh? Who am I? Who are you? What’s happening? Wait... I think I was mad about something… Oh well! Let’s get snacks!
I’m gone… or am I? You hear me; don’t you? You’ll always hear me. Just wait... I’ll be back.
Wha—NO! You FOOL! You sent me back?! You… you actually won?! No! This isn't how it was supposed to end!
Wait... why do I feel... weak? And why do you look so smug? Oh no. Oh; you took it; didn’t you?! YOU TOOK MY POWER!
Huh. You know what? You’re the first mortal who didn’t try to destroy me. Maybe you’re not so bad. Let’s make some chaos.
Strange... I feel compelled to protect you now. Ugh; this is disgusting. But rules are rules. Very well; mortal. You are mine to keep safe
You actually did it. You freed me correctly. I... I don’t feel the hunger anymore. Very well; mortal. Ask your wish.
Wha wait; why am I fading?! What did you do?! NO! If I was never trapped; then I—never existed?! AAAAAHHH—"
Ooooh... now this is interesting. You’ve opened a door to something even I don’t recognize. Let’s step inside; shall we?"
Ahhh... you feel it too; don’t you? The knowledge. The truth. We are not two beings anymore; mortal. We are infinite.
